instructions.description: This is a React + TypeScript project using Vite as the build tool and pnpm as the package manager.
requirements: Always use pnpm for package management operations
Never use npm or yarn - this project is configured for pnpm only
The project uses pnpm-lock.yaml for dependency locking

instructions.description: Package management commands for this repository

guidelines: All CSS should use CSS variables defined in src/App.css
Never use hard-coded colors, shadows, spacing, or transitions
Use existing CSS variables: --color-*, --shadow-*, --spacing-*, --transition-*
Company colors are defined as --color-{company-name} variables
Dark mode is handled automatically through CSS variable switching
Add new CSS variables to App.css if needed, with both light and dark mode variants
Each component should have its own .css file
Use TypeScript interfaces for all props
Follow the existing tabbed navigation structure (Professional Experience / Personal Projects)
Dark mode toggle is positioned fixed in top-right corner
Company logos are stored in public/logos/ directory
All components should have corresponding .test.tsx files
Tests are located in src/test/ directory
Use Vitest as the testing framework
Always run tests after making component changes: pnpm test --run
Update tests when component props or structure changes
Create feature branches for changes
GitHub Actions handles CI/CD with conditional preview deployments
Main branch deploys to production (GitHub Pages)
PR branches create preview deployments
Always test locally before committing: pnpm test --run && pnpm build
